remarks: The cardinality of a nonempty finite set is one greater than the cardinality of the set with one element removed.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 2-Feb-2013.)
statement: dif1card $p |- ( ( A e. Fin /\ X e. A ) -> ( card ` A ) = suc ( card ` ( A \ { X } ) ) ) $.
